snippet: A Republican group provided more than $600,000 for an ad attacking Justice Robin Hudson, a Democrat seeking re-election to the North Carolina Supreme Court.
abstract: Justice Robin Hudson, Democrat who is seeking re-election to North Carolina Supreme Court, will face Superior Court Judge Eric Levinson in November ballot after two receive most votes in primary; Republican group provided more than $600,000 for an ad attacking Hudson.
lead_paragraph: A Republican group provided more than $600,000 for an ad attacking Justice Robin Hudson, a Democrat seeking re-election to the North Carolina Supreme Court.

headline.main: North Carolina: Judge Attacked in Ad Campaign Survives Primary
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Judge Attacked in Ad Campaign Survives Primary
